title: Crystal Storm
summaries: The Crystal Storm is a Hardmode / pre-Hardmode magic weapon that quickly fires a slightly spread flood of tiny, bouncing crystals. The crystals are not affected by gravity, and last about three seconds each, losing velocity until gradually dissipating in midair. Their speed or fade at impact does not affect their damage output. The crystals also provide a small amount of purple light.
The Crystal Storm is the <linked>Hallowed</linked> counterpart to <linked>the Corruption</linked>'s <linked>Cursed Flames</linked>, or <linked>the Crimson</linked>'s <linked>Golden Shower</linked>.
On the Nintendo 3DS[img:Nintendo 3DS version] version, the Crystal Storm may be obtained prior to Hardmode as a rare drop from Arch Demons (0.2*1/500 (0.2%)).
On the [img:Desktop version] Desktop version, [img:Console version] Console version, and [img:Mobile version] Mobile version, its best modifier is Mythical.

On the [img:Old-gen console version] Old-gen console version, Nintendo 3DS[img:Nintendo 3DS version] version, and [img:Legacy tModLoader version] Legacy tModLoader version, its best modifier is either Masterful for mana conservation or Godly/Demonic for higher damage output. It cannot get the Mythical modifier due to its low mana cost.
